“Bal Nagari”- Children’s Adventureland

 

Year : 2022

Collaboration : Shreya Takodara

 

Brief : The brief was to design the cover page and index pages inspired from centenary celebration of PSM 100 organized in Ahemdabad,India.

 

The Children’s Cultural Land or ‘Bal Nagari’ was one such attraction at the centenary celebration, spread over 17 acres and consisting of 3 domes. Managed by children the ‘Bal Nagari” hosted fun exhibitions, educational shows and interactive games for children of all ages. Inspiring children with values like respect, hard work, teamwork, kindness and moral living.

 

 

“Power of 1” - Karyakar Suvarna Mahotsav

 

Year : 2025

 

Brief : Designed cover page for Balprakash magazine’s special edition on the Karyakar Suvarna Mahotsav (KSM 50). The objective was to capture the grandeur of the event while keeping the visuals vibrant, playful, and engaging for children. The design draws inspiration from the event’s storytelling and cultural depth, translating it into a cover that celebrates both the spirit of the festival and the magazine’s young readership.

 

 

“The Frog Story”

 

Year : 2025

Collaboration : Shreya Takoodara

 

Brief : The goal was to create lively, engaging visuals that captured the playful tone of the story through bright colors, expressive characters, and a child-friendly style. Extra care was taken to ensure the illustrations were simple yet detailed enough for young readers to connect with—balancing clarity with imagination.
